Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Booster Croptop^reset; to ^red;Kevin^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

I need to remind someone they aren't young and attractive anymore. Can you make me a ^orange;Booster Croptop^reset; that I can mail them? You can make one on a ^green;Sewing Wheel^reset;! I'll pay you.
Now for phase two! She'll never see it coming! Thanks for the help. Take this awesome briefcase. Don't open it here, or everyone will get ^green;super jealous^reset; and try to steal it. Trust me.

Texts.Chs: 他们为什么这么讨厌凯文？
